name: places/ChIJ6zV-UST2wokREtzNMQPWZpI
adrFormatAddress: 2710 Broadway, New York, NY 10025, USA

originalText.text: There is an exceptional urgent care facility in NYC that delivers top-notch medical services. The staff is known for being polite, professional, and friendly. Upon entering the facility, I feel as if they have entered a retreat, not an urgent care center. The front desk staff, medical assistants, and doctors are all amazing professionals who work together seamlessly to provide high-quality care. In case of emergencies, this center is the perfect choice for individuals who require prompt attention. They offer a range of services including flu shots, blood work, and other medical treatments. Patients like me who have been unable to get an appointment with their primary care doctor can be seen here. The facility is highly recommended for individuals who require urgent medical care in the area.

originalText.text: I had a very positive experience at the West 104th CityMD. I went in for a COVID test, and my experience was as positive as it could possibly be. The facility was fairly busy and I had to wait 45 minutes to get into a room, but that was a small issue in an overall very positive experience. Everyone I encountered there -- the woman who checked me in, the doctor who administered the test, and the doctor who gave me my results (negative, yay!) -- was friendly, polite, and very professional. I would use this CityMD again if I ever need urgent care, and I recommend it to others.

originalText.text: The clinic was extremely clean and the staff were very helpful and professional.  I tested positive for COVID and the doctor did a thorough exam and took the time to explain the next steps that I should follow. Highly recommend this.  The waiting time was one hour which I thought was reasonable considering the amount of patients.

The waiting time was one hour which I thought was reasonable considering the amount of patients.

originalText.text: The providers at this CityMD are helpful, caring, and professional. They listen well and provide high-quality medical care (better than some primary care providers I've visited in the city). The space is clean and well-maintained. Additionally, the hours are longer than some other nearby urgent cares which has been helpful when the care needed was truly urgent. I would recommend visiting this location for any urgent care needs.

originalText.text: I was visiting from out of town and my sister recommended we go to your clinic.  Walked in and was able to see doc quickly. The tech was super efficient, friendly and kind.   Doc entered and said "I'm sorry you're not feeling well."  So nice!  I was pretty knocked out and they took tests and cleared me of some illnesses and ckd me over.  Explained about new antibiotic type  and got me out quickly so I could get back to bed. Really appreciated getting the antibiotics so i could start the course before I left for home 2 days later... Wish they were my docs!  Can't thank them enough.  Did manage to see Billy Joel at MSG before I got sick, now I want to come back for Andrea Bocelli!
